job.title: Senior Data Engineer
job.description: TITLE:  Senior Data Engineer – ETL/ELT, SQL and Python or JavaLOCATION: This is a remote role.PAY: Target pay for this role may vary based on experience and location of the candidate. OVERVIEWProFocus is searching for a Senior Data Engineer with proven experience in ETL/ELT, SQL and Python or Java for a remote, direct hire role.This is an Experienced/Senior level Data Engineer role with great compensation and is responsible for developing a world-class analytics capability to enable efficient collection, aggregation, and delivery of data across a wide range of sources. Please email us your resume so we can discuss. WHAT YOU WILL BE DOINGLead the development of optimal data pipeline architectureBuild the infrastructure required for optimal extraction, transformation and loading of dataBuild analytics tools that utilize the data pipeline to provide insights into key business performance metrics WHO WE'RE LOOKING FOR5-10 years of experience in SW development or analytics with at least 5 dedicated to data engineeringExpert knowledge of ETL/ELT and streaming data tools with broad knowledge of open-source toolsAdvanced proficiency in OOP (Python preferred)Expert knowledge of SQL and cloud database administrationHave strong verbal and written communication skillsAuthorization to work in the US is a precondition of employment. We do not sponsor work visas. PREFERREDBachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Informatics, Statistics, Information Systems or demonstrate equivalent experienceHand on experience with graph databases (Neo4j) preferredProvide a strong portfolio with work samples – GitHub linkExperience authoring automated ML pipelines is strongly preferred ABOUT OUR CLIENTOur client is an established company with an exciting new subsidiary. Their mission is led by technologists and scientists using innovative technology for good. Be a part of this global momentum! WHY ProFocusCandidates come first. ProFocus recently earned the Best in Staffing Award for Talent Satisfaction due to our World-Class service to our amazing candidates.Quality process. We invest the time to learn about your skills, experience, and career goals in detail so we can find you a position that is a great fit.Access to hiring managers. We have close relationships with some of the most respected companies in Portland. Due to those relationships, we can provide direct access to managers and positions that may not be available anywhere else.Excellent benefits. We offer medical, dental, vision, 401k, education reimbursement, sick leave, and employer-paid short-term disability and life insurance.
